Text: RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTIONThanks for your thoughts John Original Message From Lokey Teb Sent Monday January AM To Long John Cramer James Nacey Sheila King Jr Frazier Cc Dietz Rick Bastida Nancy Smith Buzz Subject RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION He can net imbalances together by booking out the imbalance of one entity with the imbalance of the other entity In other words do a bookout with himself This can be done without adding the single point as a division to an existing divisional contract Original Message From Long John Sent Monday January AM To Cramer James Nacey Sheila Lokey Teb King Jr Frazier Cc Dietz Rick Bastida Nancy Smith Buzz Subject FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION Importance High I spoke with Chris Snyder this morning and his request is to add New Smyrna as a th Division to his existing Divisions in order to have one Balancing Entity vs Two Balancing Entities so he can net imbalances together He is not looking for section rights and he knows the New Smyrna lateral is constrained and he can not move any additional volumes there Chris right now will have to deal with Two Balancing Entities and this is what he is trying to avoid He will do what ever it takes on his end that we requirerequest Please take another look with the one reason Balancing in mind Give me your feedback Thanks John

FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION Cc I spoke with Chris Snyder this morning and his request is to add New Smyrna as a th Division to his existing Divisions in order to have one Balancing Entity vs Two Balancing Entities so he can net imbalances together He is not looking for section rights and he knows the New Smyrna lateral is constrained and he can not move any additional volumes there Chris right now will have to deal with Two Balancing Entities and this is what he is trying to avoid He will do what ever it takes on his end that we requirerequest Please take another look with the one reason Balancing in mind Give me your feedback Thanks John

SOUTH FLORIDA NATURAL GAS NEW SMYRNA BEACH FLORIDA PART OF SOUTHERN UNION SOLD TO FLORIDA PUBLIC UTILITIESFYISouthern Union sold South Florida Natural Gas Company to Florida Public Utilities Company on Friday December The manager Al Kara will remain with South Florida in a slightly different capacity He expects to see a news release today regarding the sale FPU has a Division nearby in Sanford Florida as well as the Palm Beach area If there are particular issues that need to be worked that I can assist with let me know FYI John

CITY OF HOMESTEAD NEW ACTING DIRECTOR OF UTILITIES AND CONTACTFYI Cc The new ACTING DIRECTOR OF UTILITIES and CONTACT at the City of Homestead is Ken Konkol same address and phone different extension The new Phone Extension is Please take note for future correspondence and contact Jim Swartz has retired

RE Can You Refer This Residential Gas Service CallWILL DO THANKS JOHN Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Monday October PM To Long John Dowden Jr Jimmy Subject Can You Refer This Residential Gas Service Call We received a call this morning from a gentleman Todd Bearden who recently moved into a home in Hollywood FL and is trying to obtain information about gas service could one of you pass this request on the appropriate person at NUICity Gas or TECOPGS
